ability.name: Pick a Card
ability.desc:
Twisted Fate randomly picks a card, then throws it at his current target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and creating a special effect based on the color of the card.

Blue: Restores @BlueCardManaRestore@ mana to all allies adjacent to Twisted Fate.
Red: Deals @ModifiedDamage@ to all enemies adjacent to the target.
Gold: Stuns the target for @GoldCardStunDuration@ seconds.

pirate.name: Pirate
pirate.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the end of each combat against another player, a treasure chest spawns on your arena containing up to 4 gold</row>

elementalist.name: Elementalist
elementalist.desc:
Innate: Elementalists gain double mana from Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, summon a Golem with 2200 Health to fight alongside your allies

demon.name: Demon
demon.desc:
Basic Attacks from Demons have a @ManaDrainProcChance@% chance to reduce their target's Mana by @ManaDrainBurn@ and restore Mana to the Demon.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaDrainDrain@ Mana restored

wild.name: Wild
wild.desc:
Select allies become empowered, causing their Basic Attacks to generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times), granting @AttackSpeedPercent@% Bonus Attack Speed per stack.

(@MinUnits@) Wild Allies Only
(@MinUnits@) All Allies, and gain "Basic Attacks cannot be dodged"

void.name: Void
void.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Basic Attacks and spells from Void champions deal true damage</row>

brawler.name: Brawler
brawler.desc:
Brawlers gain bonus Maximum Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Bonus Health

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Dragons gain @MagicReduction@% resistance to Magic Damage</row>

exile.name: Exile
exile.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to @ShieldPercent@% of their maximum Health</row>

yordle.name: Yordle
yordle.desc:
Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy Basic Attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @MissPercent@% Chance to Dodge

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, Guardians grant +@Armor@ Armor to adjacent allies (this bonus can stack any number of times)</row>

knight.name: Knight
knight.desc:
All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

(@MinUnits@) @BlockAmount@ Damage Blocked

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.desc:
Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

(@MinUnits@) Ninja gains +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) All Ninjas gain +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.desc:
Every @ProcRate@ seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for @ProcRate@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Double Attack Speed

shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
shapeshifter.desc:
Shapeshifters gain bonus Maximum Health when they transform.

(@MinUnits@) @HPPercent@% Bonus Maximum Health

gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.desc:
Gunslinger Basic Attacks have a @ProcPercent@% chance to fire additional bullets at other enemies within range.

These bullets deal damage like Basic Attacks and apply on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies
(@MinUnits@) Attack @ExtraTargetsHit@ extra enemies

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.desc:
Innate: Sorcerers gain double Mana from Basic Attacks.

All allies have increased Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) +@AP@% Spell Power

robot.name: Robot
robot.desc: (@MinUnits@) Robots start combat at full Mana

hextech.name: Hextech
hextech.desc:
At the start of combat, an ally Hextech launches and detonates a pulse bomb, temporarily disabling nearby enemy items for @DisableDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius
(@MinUnits@) @HexSize@ Hex Radius

phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, a random enemy's Health is set to @HPToSet@</row>

noble.name: Noble
noble.desc:
At the start of combat, select allies gain +@Armor@ Armor, +@MagicResist@ Magic Resistance, and heal @Heal@ Health on-hit.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Ally
(@MinUnits@) All Allies

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy.

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage & +@CritChanceAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Chance

glacial.name: Glacial
glacial.desc:
Basic Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun their target for @StunDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Stun

imperial.name: Imperial
imperial.desc:
At the start of combat, select Imperials are empowered to deal double damage.

(@MinUnits@) 1 Random Imperial
(@MinUnits@) All Imperials

blademaster.name: Blademaster
blademaster.desc:
Blademaster Basic Attacks have a @ProcChance@% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) One Additional Attack
(@MinUnits@) Two Additional Attacks
(@MinUnits@) Four Additional Attacks

12.name: Sword of the Divine
12.desc: Each second, the wearer has a @ChanceToProc@% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for the rest of combat.

13.name: Hextech Gunblade
13.desc: Basic Attacks and spells heal the wearer for @OmniVamp@% of the damage dealt.

14.name: Spear of Shojin
14.desc: After casting their spell, the wearer's Basic Attacks restore @ManaPercentRestore@% of their Maximum Mana.

15.name: Guardian Angel
15.desc: When the wearer dies, they cleanse negative effects and revive with up to @HealthRestore@ Health after a @StasisDuration@ second delay.  This effect can trigger once per combat.

16.name: The Bloodthirster
16.desc: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for @Lifesteal@% of the damage dealt.

17.name: Zeke's Herald
17.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain +@AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

18.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
18.desc: Extra attack damage +@AD@ Wearer is also an Assassin [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

22.name: Rapid Firecannon
22.desc: Wearer gains +100% Attack Range and their Basic Attacks cannot be dodged.

23.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
23.desc: Basic Attacks grant the wearer +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.  This effect can stack any number of times.

24.name: Statikk Shiv
24.desc: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals @Damage@ magical damage to @BouncesTooltip@ enemies.

25.name: Phantom Dancer
25.desc: Wearer dodges all Basic Attacks that would critically strike. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

26.name: Cursed Blade
26.desc: Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToShrink@% chance on-hit to decrease the target's star level by 1 for the rest of combat.

27.name: Titanic Hydra
27.desc: Basic Attacks deal @MaxHealth@% of the wearer's Maximum Health as physical damage in a cone behind the target.

28.name: Blade of the Ruined King
28.desc: Extra attack speed +@AS@ Wearer is also a Blademaster [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

33.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
33.desc: Wearer gains +@APPercentAmp@% Spell Power Amplification.  (All sources of Spell Power are @APPercentAmp@% more effective)

34.name: Luden's Echo
34.desc: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, the first target hit and up to @ExtraBounces@ nearby enemies are dealt an additional @Damage@ magic damage.

35.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
35.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks @ShieldValue@ damage for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

36.name: Ionic Spark
36.desc: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, the wearer deals @Damage@ true damage to the caster.

37.name: Morellonomicon
37.desc: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing @BurnPercent@% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over @BurnDuration@ seconds and reducing healing by 80% for the duration of the burn. A champion can only have one burn effect at a time, preferring the strongest. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

38.name: Yuumi
38.desc: Extra attack power +@AP@ Wearer is also a Sorcerer [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

44.name: Seraph's Embrace
44.desc: After casting their spell, the wearer restores @ManaRestore@ Mana.

45.name: Frozen Heart
45.desc: Reduces the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by @AttackSpeedSlow@%.

46.name: Hush
46.desc: Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToSilence@% chance to silence the target on-hit, preventing the enemy from gaining mana for @SilenceDuration@ seconds.

47.name: Redemption
47.desc: When the wearer falls below @HPThreshold@% Health, nearby allies are healed for @HealthRestore@ Health after a 2.5 second delay.  This effect can trigger once per combat.

48.name: Darkin
48.desc: Extra mana +@Mana@ Wearer is also a Demon [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

55.name: Thornmail
55.desc: When the wearer is hit by a Basic Attack, they reflect @DamageReflect@% of the mitigated damage as magic damage.

56.name: Sword Breaker
56.desc: Wearer's Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToDisarm@% chance to disarm the target for @DisarmDuration@ seconds, preventing that enemy from Basic Attacking.

57.name: Red Buff
57.desc: Wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing @BurnPercent@% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over @BurnDuration@ seconds and reducing healing by 80% for the duration of the burn. A champion can only have one burn effect at a time, preferring the strongest. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

58.name: Knight's Vow
58.desc: Extra armor +@Armor@ Wearer is also a Knight [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

66.name: Dragon's Claw
66.desc: Wearer gains @MagicReduction@% resistance to magic damage.

67.name: Zephyr
67.desc: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for @BanishDuration@ seconds.

68.name: Runaan's Hurricane
68.desc: Extra magic resistance +@ExtraMR@ Basic Attack fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing @MultiplierForDamage@% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

77.name: Warmog's Armor
77.desc: Wearer regenerates @HealthRegen@% of their missing Health per second.

78.name: Frozen Mallet
78.desc: Extra health +@Health@ Wearer is also glacial [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

88.name: Force of Nature
88.desc: Wearer's team gains +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ maximum team size.

200.name: Neeko's Help
200.desc: Place on a champion to create a one-star copy of them. [CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]

21536083.name: Ninjas Assassins
21536083.author: KenjiHimura
21536083.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Heavy openning damage;
- Strong against spread out enemies;
- Medium cost champions ( average cost ~ 2,5);

### 2. CONS

- Highly dependent of Akali; 
- Low defensive power champions;
- Low damage and survival against grouped champions or that are equipped with [[item=phantom-dancer]].


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=knight]] [[trait=glacial]] [[trait=yordle]]

[[item=phantom-dancer]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=pyke]]
[[champion=shen]]
[[champion=zed]]
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=kassadin]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=reksai]] → [[champion=akali]]

[[champion=kassadin]]→[[champion=kennen]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=evelynn]]
[[champion=rengar]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=evelynn]][[champion=rengar]] → [[champion=katarina]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=youmuus-ghostblade]]→ [[champion=kennen]]

87952585.name: Imperial blademaster
87952585.author: KenjiHimura
87952585.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Strong survivability;
- Main DPS deal double damage (imperials' bonus);


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 4 coins);
- Strongly mana’s dependent;
- Weak crowd control;
- Strongly dependent on Swain (Imperials' bonus);


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=glacial]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=darius]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=shen]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=katarina]]
[[champion=draven]]

[[champion=garen]]→ [[champion=sejuani]]

[[champion=vayne]]→[[champion=aatrox]]

[[champion=swain]]

#### Late Game:

[[champion=shen]]→[[champion=kayle]]

[[champion=fiora]]→[[champion=yasuo]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=aatrox]][[champion=yasuo]]→[[champion=fiora]][[champion=shen]]

[[champion=kayle]]→[[champion=chogath]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=blade-of-the-ruined-king]]→[[champion=kayle]][[champion=katarina]][[champion=darius]]

[[item=darkin]]→[[champion=kayle]][[champion=draven]][[champion=yasuo]]

[[item=frozen-mallet]]→[[champion=kayle]]

0b6a75b7.name: Yordle Sorcerers
0b6a75b7.author: KenjiHimura
0b6a75b7.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Strong crowd control;
- Strong against grouped champions;

### 2. CONS

- Need to swap champions during the match;
- Heavily Gnar dependent composition;
- Less efficient in damage and crowd control against spread out enemies;

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=dragon]][[trait=wild]]

[[item=rapid-firecannon]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=lucian]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=graves]] → [[champion=poppy]]
 
[[champion=lucian]] → [[champion=veigar]]

[[champion=kennen]]

[[champion=gnar]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]
[[champion=karthus]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS
 
[[champion=aurelion-sol]] [[champion=karthus]] → [[champion=ahri]] [[champion=kayle]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS
[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]] → [[champion=kennen]] [[champion=poppy]] [[champion=gnar]]

2a8b8ec7.name: Glacial Rangers
2a8b8ec7.author: KenjiHimura
2a8b8ec7.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Extra survivability thanks to Kindred’s ability;
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);
- Strong against grouped champions;

### 2. CONS

- Composition is very dependent on Kindred;
- Champions of medium to high cost (median cost: 3)
- Less efficient in damage and crowd control against spread out enemies;

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=mordekaiser]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=braum]]



#### Mid Game:

[[champion=ashe]]

[[champion=kindred]]

 [[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=sejuani]]

[[champion=fiora]]→ [[champion=volibear]]

#### Late Game:

[[champion=anivia]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS
 
[[champion=anivia]]→ [[champion=braum]] [[champion=kayle]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

 [[item=frozen-mallet]] → [[champion=kayle]] [[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]] [[champion=kindred]]

[[item=runaans-hurricane]]→ [[champion=ashe]] [[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]] [[champion=kindred]]

cbaa9885.name: Demons and Shapeshifters
cbaa9885.author: KenjiHimura
cbaa9885.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Mana control of the opponents;
- Neutralize various types of champions that depend on mana to transform and/or crowd control;
- Strong against grouped enemies.

### 2. CONS

- Need to swap champions during the match;
- High cost champions ( median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Area damage and control efficiency reduced against spread out enemies.

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=yordle]] [[trait=demon]]

[[trait=assassin]][[trait=ninja]]

[[item=hush]] 
[[item=sword-breaker]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=elise]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=nidalee]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=shyvana]]
[[champion=morgana]]
[[champion=aatrox]]
[[champion=evelynn]]

#### Late Game:
[[champion=shyvana]]→ [[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=nidalee]]→ [[champion=swain]]

[[champion=evelynn]]→[[champion=brand]]

[[champion=draven]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=brand]]→[[champion=evelynn]]

[[champion=swain]] →[[champion=nidalee]]+[[item=darkin]]

[[champion=swain]] →[[champion=shyvana]]+[[item=darkin]]
 
### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=darkin]]

[[item=blade-of-the-ruined-king]]→[[champion=varus]] [[champion=gnar]] [[champion=swain]]

f7ecbb64.name: Hextech Nobles
f7ecbb64.author: KenjiHimura
f7ecbb64.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong survivability;
- Champions of medium cost (median cost: 2.5 coins);
- Minor need in changing champions’s positions;

### 2. CONS

- Heavily dependent on Kayle to get the full Noble bonus;
- Heavily dependent on items;
- Needs 2x [[item=spatula]] to make 2x[[item=runaans-hurricane]] for Jinx;
- Difficult to achieve full efficiency (lack of alternative champions to complete the Nobles’ bonus)

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=hextech]] [[trait=demon]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=sword-breaker]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=tristana]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=varus]]

[[champion=lucian]]

[[champion=vi]]

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=jinx]]

[[champion=graves]]→[[champion=leona]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=kayle]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=vi]]→ [[champion=jayce]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=red-buff]] [[item=cursed-blade]] [[item=sword-breaker]] → [[champion=jinx]] [[champion=lucian]]

46baae21.name: Void Guardian and Sorcerer
46baae21.author: KenjiHimura
46baae21.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong survivability; 
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);
- Strong against magic damage compositions.

### 2. CONS

- High cost champions ( average cost ~ 4);
- Dependent on two Tier 5 Champions (Karthus and Pantheon);
- Relatively low damage if you don't have Aurelian Sol with the right items and if you don't have the sorcerer’s bonus.

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=kassadin]]
[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=braum]]
[[champion=mordekaiser]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=kindred]]

[[champion=khazix]]→ [[champion=chogath]]

[[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=leona]]

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=mordekaiser]]→ [[champion=karthus]]

[[champion=pantheon]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

 [[champion=chogath]][[champion=reksai]]→[[champion=khazix]] 

[[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]] 

[[champion=karthus]]→[[champion=mordekaiser]] 


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]]→[[champion=chogath]] [[champion=reksai]] [[champion=pantheon]]

20a9b889.name: Ranger Knights and Guardian
20a9b889.author: KenjiHimura
20a9b889.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong single damage;
- Extra survivability thanks to Kindred’s ability;
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);

### 2. CONS

- Composition is very dependent on Kindred;
- Champions of medium to high cost (median cost: 3,5 coins)
- Less efficient crowd control against spread out enemies;

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=yordle]]

[[item=frozen-heart]]
[[item=hush]]
[[item=sword-breaker]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=mordekaiser]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=garen]]→[[champion=sejuani]] 

[[champion=fiora]]→[[champion=leona]]

[[champion=ashe]]

[[champion=kindred]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=pantheon]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

 [[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=frozen-mallet]]→[[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]][[champion=kindred]][[champion=pantheon]][[champion=leona]]

[[item=runaans-hurricane]]→[[champion=ashe]][[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]][[champion=kindred]]

[[item=darkin]]→[[champion=sejuani]]

a939eb18.name: Void Assassins
a939eb18.author: KenjiHimura
a939eb18.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong burst damage;
- Strong single damage;
- Champions of low cost (median cost: 2.5 coins).

### 2. CONS

- Low defensive power;
- Weak against grouped enemies;
- Damage efficiency reduced against enemies equiped with [[item=phantom-dancer]];
- Dependent of [[item=youmuus-ghostblade]] in Kassadin (to obtain and complete assassins’ bonus).


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=knight]]
[[trait=yordle]]
[[trait=glacial]]
[[trait=guardian]]

[[item=frozen-heart]]
[[item=phantom-dancer]]
[[item=sword-breaker]]

[[champion=kayle]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=kassadin]]
[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=pyke]]
[[champion=zed]]



#### Mid Game:

[[champion=evelynn]]

[[champion=chogath]]

[[champion=zed]]→[[champion=akali]]


#### Late Game:


[[champion=rengar]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS
 
[[champion=akali]]→[[champion=zed]]

[[champion=rengar]][[champion=evelynn]]→[[champion=katarina]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=youmuus-ghostblade]]→[[champion=kassadin]]
[[champion=reksai]][[champion=chogath]]

[[item=rapid-firecannon]]

d9be3317.name: Yordle Shapeshifters and Sorcerers
d9be3317.author: KenjiHimura
d9be3317.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong area damage;
- Strong against grouped enemies.

### 2. CONS
- Medium to high cost champions (median cost: 3,5 coins);
- Dependent on several Tier 4 and 5 champions;
- Strongly mana dependent;
- Strongly dependent on magic damage.

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=glacial]]
[[trait=dragon]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=rapid-firecannon]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=kennen]]
[[champion=veigar]]
[[champion=ahri]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=poppy]]

[[champion=kennen]]→[[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=shyvana]]

[[champion=sejuani]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=veigar]]→[[champion=aurelion-sol]]

[[champion=swain]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=ahri]]→[[champion=veigar]]

[[champion=swain]]→[[champion=elise]]

[[champion=sejuani]]→[[champion=kayle]][[champion=pantheon]]+[[item=knights-vow]]
 

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]]→[[champion=swain]][[champion=gnar]]

[[item=darkin]]→[[champion=sejuani]]

[[item=knights-vow]]→[[champion=shyvana]][[champion=gnar]] [[champion=pantheon]]

389d6d13.name: Demons Shapeshifters and Guardian
389d6d13.author: KenjiHimura
389d6d13.guide:
### 1. PROS
- Strong crowd control;
- Strong area damage;
- Strong survivability;
- Strong against grouped enemies.

### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 4 coins);
- Strongly mana’s dependent;
- Need to swap champions during the match;
- Dependent on two Tier 5 champions (Pantheon and Swain).

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=ranger]]
[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=glacial]]

[[item=hush]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=nidalee]]
[[champion=elise]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=jayce]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=evelynn]]

[[champion=nidalee]]→[[champion=shyvana]]

[[champion=varus]]→[[champion=morgana]]

[[champion=jayce]]→ [[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=brand]]

[[champion=leona]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=elise]]→[[champion=swain]]

[[champion=pantheon]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS
 
[[champion=swain]]→[[champion=elise]]

[[champion=evelynn]]→[[champion=aatrox]]

[[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=runaans-hurricane]]→[[champion=morgana]][[champion=brand]][[champion=swain]]

6e54782f.name: Shapeshifters and Guardians
6e54782f.author: KenjiHimura
6e54782f.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong survivability;
- Strong against grouped enemies.

### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Strongly depends on mana to transform;
- Dependent on two tier 5 champions (Pantheon and Swain).

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=glacial]]


[[item=hush]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=nidalee]]
[[champion=elise]]
[[champion=jayce]]
[[champion=ahri]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=shyvana]]
[[champion=leona]]
[[champion=gnar]]
[[champion=vi]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=ahri]]→[[champion=swain]]

[[champion=vi]]→[[champion=pantheon]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

 [[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=darkin]]→[[champion=gnar]][[champion=shyvana]][[champion=jayce]][[champion=nidalee]]

[[item=runaans-hurricane]]→[[champion=jayce]][[champion=swain]]

08f3502e.name: Rangers Elementalists and Glacial
08f3502e.author: KenjiHimura
08f3502e.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong against grouped enemies;
- Strong crowd control;
- Strong single damage;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Composition is very dependent on Kindred (Ranger's bonus and survivability);
- Few tanks;
- Squishy champions;


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=assassin]]
[[trait=glacial]]
[[trait=brawler]]

[[item=sword-breaker]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]

[[champion=chogath]]
[[champion=kayle]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=braum]]
[[champion=lissandra]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=ashe]]

[[champion=kindred]]

[[champion=fiora]]→[[champion=brand]]

[[champion=garen]]→[[champion=sejuani]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=braum]]→[[champion=anivia]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=brand]]→[[champion=kennen]]

[[champion=anivia]]→[[champion=braum]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=zekes-herald]]

[[item=locket-of-the-iron-solari]]

[[item=runaans-hurricane]]→[[champion=ashe]][[champion=varus]][[champion=kindred]][[champion=vayne]]

cdb3bbb6.name: Blademaster, Gunslinger and Hextech
cdb3bbb6.author: KenjiHimura
cdb3bbb6.guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong single damage;
- Disables enemy items at the beginning of the turn;
- Strong burst damage;


### 2. CONS

- Weak crowd control;
- Weak survivability;
- High cost champions (median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Dependent on two tier 5 champions;
- Dependent of [[item=blade-of-the-ruined-king]] on Lucian (or another Gunslinger);


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=glacial]]
[[trait=noble]]

[[trait=assassin]][[trait=ninja]]

[[item=sword-breaker]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]

[[champion=chogath]]
[[champion=sejuani]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=camille]]
[[champion=shen]]
[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=lucian]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=fiora]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=graves]]→[[champion=gangplank]]

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=jinx]]

[[champion=fiora]]→ [[champion=draven]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=miss-fortune]]
[[champion=yasuo]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=camille]][[champion=yasuo]]→[[champion=aatrox]][[champion=fiora]]


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]
[[item=zekes-herald]]
[[item=locket-of-the-iron-solari]]

[[item=blade-of-the-ruined-king]]→[[champion=gangplank]][[champion=jinx]][[champion=lucian]][[champion=miss-fortune]]

[[item=hush]][[item=sword-breaker]][[item=cursed-blade]]→[[champion=gangplank]][[champion=jinx]][[champion=lucian]][[champion=miss-fortune]]
